editorialNotes.tagline: New ways to sketch and animate
editorialNotes.standard: With stunning filters and thousands of importable brushes, this app lets you generate high-calibre artwork at a blistering pace. It supports pressure sensitivity and Apple Pencil–as well as iCloud Drive–so sharing your work is incredibly simple.
editorialNotes.short: This super-intuitive app makes it simple to paint your next masterpiece.

editorialNotes.tagline: The tools for your first draft

editorialNotes.standard: With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates, and customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.
Learn to read and pronounce words with your new friend!
editorialNotes.tagline: Learn to read with a friend

editorialNotes.standard: Everyone needs a task manager—and Things is adaptable enough for anyone. This Apple Design Award winner is crisp and lightweight, featuring a simple but effective interface. The ever-present Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-do’s from anywhere in the app, and organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them. It’s like the unicorn of productivity tools: deep enough for serious work, surprisingly easy to use, and gorgeous enough to enjoy staring at.
editorialNotes.short: Organize class projects, assignments and daily to-do lists.
Help yourself resist distractions from your device.

ios.subtitle: Install all the fonts you need

editorialNotes.standard: Coloring. It’s fun, creative, and just for little kids. Right? Wrong. Once you get your hands on this virtual coloring book—designed for adults—you’ll wise up to this one simple fact: we never should have quit. Each illustration is wonderful designed, and we loved switching between watercolors, colored pencils, and pens to make every piece unique.
editorialNotes.short: Add texture and depth with the watercolour tool.

name: Dumb Ways JR Loopy's Train Set

editorialNotes.short: Design and build tracks for your train to run on.
editorialNotes.tagline: Let's design tracks for your train

name: Battery Life Doctor -Manage Phone Battery (No Ads)

advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

Best Stalker IPTV App with EPG

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, this multitrack video editor meets you there. Its features are rarely found in an iPad app, and everything’s accessible through an intuitive touch interface.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.
